I’m looking for lots of different books. First, I’m looking to take my GED next year. _user_ Can you help me choose a good book to study?
This request is actually for someone else. My sister is really into romance books. _user_, Do you see anything that she might enjoy
So. I’m thinking about getting a job in the field of education. Is there a book you could recommend so I can learn more?
All my friends are using facebook and I don’t even have a clue how to get on there. Is there a book that will teach me how to use Facebook?
My church recommends reading some books on the history of Christianity. _user_, Do you see a book that will teach me about that?
I still need some help. I’m doing some home repairs for my mother. Can you find a book that will help me with the plumbing?
Oh, I almost forgot! I also want to cook for my mother when I visit her, but I don’t know how to cook. _user_, which book do you think would help me?
OK, let me think. I’m really concerned about world pollution and how it affects our health, do you see a book that will help me learn more about that?
I have heard that I should take better care of my mental health, do you have a book that describes how I can raise my self-esteem?
Finally, I need a book to read for fun. Recently, I got into reading science fiction stories._user_ Which one of these books should I read?"
